name: QWERTY Quacker
description:
You're hired as a social media manager for some guy with high status. You're in charge of sending quacks on the popular social media platform Quacker. The problem is, your boss installed a software that messes up your keyboard. The keyboard layout changes about every quack you send. Luckily, the last intern left a handy guide for you.

(Made for Brackey's Jam 2021.2)

Background Music:

"March of the Spoons" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
